spring_movie_0.Title: The Brave Little Sapling
spring_movie_0.Description: An animated family comedy about a little sprout on a magical adventure to become a tree!

Scenes.Text: The Brave Little Sapling
The brave little sapling is leaving his home. He hesitates for a moment and turns around, knowing he won't be back for a long time...
The other saplings of his grove are gathered at the edge of town, excitedly waving their twigs goodbye...!
Oh no! Out of nowhere, it starts raining...! The little sapling goes into a sprint as thunderclouds loom overhead...
Fearing for his life, and demoralized by the relentless downpour, the brave little sapling begins to lose hope...
...But what's this...? The sapling feels a tingling on the top of his head...

Scenes.Script: /playSound coin/pause 1000/message "Perhaps a little rain was what it needed to begin its journey into becoming a tree!"

Scenes.Text: Farewell, little buddy!

fall_movie_0.Description: Peer behind the midnight veil... You must experience to believe!

Scenes.Text: 'Mysterium'
A faint silhouette in the dark...
The desolate, unknown void of space... where untold horrors await.

'You MUST tell your friends to see MYSTERIUM tonight...'
'...Or I will visit you in your sleep!'

summer_movie_0.Title: Journey Of The Prairie King: The Motion Picture
summer_movie_0.Description: The beloved video game comes to the silver screen!

Scenes.Text: 'Journey Of The Prairie King: The Motion Picture'
On the dusty old trail once again, we find Prairie King watching over a wagon train full of valuable treasure.
But, unbeknownst to our hero, the evil outlaw is watching from a nearby cliff...
'At last, I'll do away with that self-righteous sheriff and make off with the treasure... I deserve it!'
'Whoops! Looks like this avalanche is headed straight for the wagon train.'
The Prairie King hears a faint rumbling in the distance... Look!

Scenes.Script: /pause 1000/message "Thinking quickly, he fires a shot."/pause 500/playSound cowboy_gunload/pause 500/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 500
/pause 200/playSound cowboy_explosion/pause 1000/message "But what's this? Water's flying everywhere!"

Scenes.Text: He's done it again! The thick mud stops the avalanche in its tracks.
The wagon train is saved.
The End.

summer_movie_1.Title: Wumbus
summer_movie_1.Description: An absurd sci-fi comedy centered around the life and times of a lumpy guy from another star.

Scenes.Text: 'Wumbus'
Wumbus, always at ease, stretches out and enjoys the warmth of his planet's sun.
His faithful servant, FoodBot, provides a steady stream of fried gluten pucks and 'red sauce'.
Wumbus tries to get his nephew, Rossel, interested in star-system culture and affairs, but Rossel is unimpressed.
'Pshhaw!'
The movie is a humorous slice-of-life into Wumbus' strange world, a world where technology and society have 'advanced' to an extreme degree.
Many scenes attempt to find humor in the absurdity of the modern lifestyle.
But, despite having near-infinite entertainment options, Wumbus and his group of friends still enjoy gathering for a delicious meal of 'pizza' (formed from 100% gluten materials).

winter_movie_1.Title: The Zuzu City Express
winter_movie_1.Description: A beloved movie classic, carefully restored for modern theaters.

Scenes.Text: 'The Zuzu City Express'
The Zuzu City Express makes one final trip south, from the icy coast... It's a three day journey!
A young lady peers wistfully out the window.
The movie explores a timeless theme... the conflict between reason and emotion.
Will she follow the directions of her rational mind, or the longings of her heart?
The movie ends before we ever find out...

winter_movie_0.Title: The Miracle At Coldstar Ranch
winter_movie_0.Description: Against all odds, a family keeps the spirit of the Winter Star alive...

Scenes.Text: 'The Miracle at Coldstar Ranch'
It's the eve of The Winter Star, and it's been snowing for 3 weeks straight.
The Coldstar family is stranded... getting to town is impossible. Fortunately, the cows have enough hay to get by.
...But the family has run out of food.
Still, Papa Coldstar braves the treacherous conditions to cut down the winter star tree...
In spite of their hunger, the family decorates the tree, keeping the promise of the Winter Star alive.
That night, an unusual phenomenon...

Scenes.Script: /pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite coldstarMiracle/pause 500/playSound discoverMineral/pause 3000/message "The next day, Mama Coldstar is astonished to find the tree adorned with cosmic fruit."/pause 500/message "'We believed in the Winter Star, and so we were remembered!'"

Scenes.Text: They all shared the Stardrop fruit. Despite its small size, it was the most filling and delicious meal they'd ever had.
The family is saved, and the spirit of hope is alive and well. The promise of the Winter Star is kept once again...

spring_movie_1.Title: Natural Wonders: Exploring Our Vibrant World
spring_movie_1.Description: Take a tour through the lands of the Ferngill Republic... from The Fern Islands to Zuzu City, this world is full of life!

Scenes.Text: 'Natural Wonders: Exploring Our Vibrant World'
The Fern Islands, a tropical paradise 80 miles off the southern coast. The islands formed due to volcanic activity in the region, and are still growing...
The warm climate of the southern ocean allows for extreme biodiversity... in short, the island is teeming with life!
Now we move north to the bustle of Zuzu City. It's a world of concrete and steel, illuminated by the glow of city light.
The conditions may be harsh, but still, we find abundant life...
Far to the west, alone in the vast Gem Sea, lies Prairie Island. In spite of its name, this land is home to a diverse array of natural biomes.
The island is known for its abundant population of raccoons!
Finally, we return to the mainland, to visit one of the most pleasant areas of the continent... Stardew Valley.
The temperate climate of the valley is the perfect home for a variety of woodland creatures and insects. What a beautiful place!

fall_movie_1.Title: It Howls In The Rain
fall_movie_1.Description: A group of youngsters set out to discover the source of a mysterious sound. (Parental Supervision Required)

Scenes.Script: /pause 1000/playSound cavedrip/pause 1000/playSound cavedrip/spriteText 7 "It Howls In The Rain "

Scenes.Text: 'The following footage was salvaged from an abandoned camcorder 30 miles south of Grampleton'
'Did you hear that? I think it came from those woods... Let's go...'
(The camera lurches forward into the forest)
'Oh, it's just you, Gary... *pant* *pant*... Stop grabbing my arm!'
